review_details: We stayed here last week and I cannot rate high enough Maria and the staff are all amazing the food the pool the rooms are just perfect.Our daughter was poorly for a few days but after a visit to the hospital she was quickly on the mend all organised by the brilliant staff.If it's a relaxing break you want then BOOK NOW.WOW WOW WOW.nothing is to much trouble.see you next year olive grove

This is a unique experience that must be had .I was on my own but everybody was so friendly,Antonia and all her family you are amazing at what you do and you food is out of this world.i will see you all next year

We stayed at olive grove last week and visited this restaurant nearly everyday,it is just at the end of the road from the appartments and is amazing especially the freshly squeased orange juice which my little girl loved,my wife was a massive fan of the halloumi and tomatoes.for me it was all about the Greek salads absolutely amazing.if you are in the area then you must visit.Allan Mcintyre
